contents.item: you can't just tell someone to trust you..you gotta show them that they can trust you....

...You have knowledge, and I have skill, and between us we have...""We have the Ring of Erreth-Akbe.""Yes, that. But I thought also of another thing between us. Call it trust... That is one of its names. It is a very great thing. Though each of us alone is weak, having that we are strong, stronger than the Powers of the Dark.
contents.owner: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Tombs of Atuan

contents.item: Trust had become a commodity that few could afford.

Evan to Bethany: "Just trust me.""You say it like it's so easy.""Of course it's not.""Then how am I supposed to 'just trust' you?""Funny thing about trust...Sometimes you have to give it before you can experience it.
I've tried to make choices. You don't really trust me to.
Never trust a man with a lunatic wife in an attic," Richard told me. "And anyone named Heathcliff should make you suspicious.
Trust is like a valuable antique, once gone, it can never be replaced.
It will be a very long time before I trust you ever, ever - OK, I trust you again.
contents.owner: Daniel Handler, Why We Broke Up

contents.item: The first lie of life is to say that there is such a thing as trust. Can you truly say you even trust yourself?
contents.owner: Michelle Horst, The Land of Shadows

contents.item: Sometimes the ones you trust aren't the most trustworthy. Just better actors.
contents.owner: Veronica Blade, Something Witchy This Way Comes

contents.item: I didn’t like trusting, I didn’t like setting greater than mild expectations,
When someone talks about their problems, it doesn't just mean they're complaining, it means they trust you enough to tell you.
contents.owner: Ziad K. Abdelnour, Economic Warfare: Secrets of Wealth Creation in the Age of Welfare Politics

contents.item: I’d rather trust and regret than doubt and regret. - Kirito
Trust is a hard thing to win back.

Trust is not a passive state of mind. It is a vigorous act of the soul by which we choose to lay hold on the promises of God and cling to them despite the adversity that at times seeks to overwhelms us.
contents.owner: Jerry Bridges, Trusting God: Even When Life Hurts

contents.item: If I'm not telling you something, it's for a reason. Just because you trust me, it doesn't mean I have to automatically trust you. Trust doesn't work like that.
Trust means everything. But when it is broken, sorry mean nothing.
Like some dogs: kick them once and they never trust you again, no matter how nice you are to them.
Trust was now a four-letter word.
contents.owner: Ally Blake, Getting Red-Hot with the Rogue

contents.item: If you can't trust, you can't be trustworthy.
contents.owner: Craig Ferguson, Between the Bridge and the River
